example.eg: You need to get rid of those pants - you never wear them anymore.
example.egtrans: 你需要扔掉那些裤子，反正你也不会再穿了。

example.eg: The local museum got rid of its entrance charge; it's free to go in now.
example.egtrans: 当地博物馆免除了入场费，现在免费开放。

example.eg: I'm trying to think of some way of getting rid of him.
